ISSUE.TITLE: psycopg2-binary installation error for python ver. 3.12.2
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: https://github.com/HumanSignal/label-studio/blob/7951ac3f5e86d490dab5facb29fce24294641ea1/pyproject.toml#L182 This has to be changed to 2.9.9 with poverty.lock packages edit.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: LEAP-1036: Revert validation on attr name (#5784) We are reverting the validation of the attribute name on visual tags because it is disrupting the workflow. We plan to devise a method to validate these attributes by showing a warning, instead of breaking the workflow, and will implement this solution afterwards --------- Co-authored-by: robot-ci-heartex <robot-ci-heartex@users.noreply.github.com>

COMMIT.MESSAGE: chore: LEAP-1017: bump sqlparse for security (and psycopg2 to unblock 3.12) (#5785) psycopg2 to 2.9.9 (https://www.psycopg.org/docs/news.html#what-s-new-in-psycopg-2-9-9) sqlparse to 0.5.0 (https://github.com/andialbrecht/sqlparse/blob/master/CHANGELOG) resolves #5775
